Public Configurations

These are Public configurations that will be available at the following endpoint

{{ projectUrl }}/config.json
Do not put any private information within these settings as they are available to the public.
How to use Public Configurations

You can provide any Key and Value pairs that will be represented as follows at the url {{ projectUrl }}/config.json.

{
   key: "value"
}

If you wish to have the value as a JSON object, then ensure you click on the JSON checkbox when providing the value for that configuration. The value would then look something like the following.

{"one": "Item One", "two": "Item Two"}
